titleStmt.title: Description of Haverford College Rendel Harris 35: Devotional Book.

See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

msIdentifier.repository: Quaker and Special Collections, Rendel Harris

msContents.summary: Devotional book containing prayers and selections from the Qurʼān.

name.#text: J. Rendel Harris Collection (Quaker & Special Collections, Haverford College)

supportDesc.extent: i, 64, i leaves : 150 x 100 (95 x 52) mm, bound to 150 x 105 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation in pencil added, upper left recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in clear naskh in black ink; pointed, vocalized.

decoNote: Polychrome and gold headpiece (f. 1v); polychrome and gold marginal medallions; textblock ruled in gold, black, red; gold roundels with blue and red dots in the center and around the edge punctuate text.

binding.p: Red leather over pasteboard with flap (Type II); gilt-stamped onlays of central mandorla with two pendants on the vertical axis, cornerpieces and frame.

origin.p: Item is undated, but probably copied in the 18th century, perhaps in Turkey.

history.provenance: Formerly owned by ʻUmar ʻAfāʻat Hamlar (f. 1r).

surface.@n: Inside back cover flap open to show design
Back cover flap opened to show design
Fore edge flap closed, inside front cover
